roleset.name: to contaminate, deteriorate from normal standard

example.name: Transitive
example.text: ...There is no evidence *0*-1 * to suggest that he either corrupted their data or sold it for gain.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. VerbNet entry 45.4. frame by Claire. Based on verb frame corrupt.01, but differs in that only corrupted thing seems grammatical with adjective.
